title: Calling for investment proposals for exploration and production of petroleum and natural gas in four (04) blocks 	within the Mannar Basin and obtaining the service of a Marketing Consultant
decision_details: - According to the exploration and drilling carried out by Cairn Lanka (Pvt) Ltd in 2011, 02 natural gas deposits have been discovered in the M2 exploration block in the Mannar Basin, which has proven the existence of a viable hydrocarbon system in the Mannar Basin. As per the provisions of the Petroleum Resources Act, No.21 of 2021, the Petroleum Development Authority of Sri Lanka is authorized to invite investment proposals for offshore petroleum and natural gas exploration blocks in keeping with the procedure approved by the Cabinet and prescribed by regulations. Accordingly, the proposal made by the Minister of Energy, to conduct a licensing round to call for investment proposals for the exploration and production of petroleum and natural gas in the 04 exploration blocks in the Mannar Basin, and to obtain the servìces of a suitable marketing consultant to implement an effective marketing program for that purpose, was approved by the Cabinet.
